description: You can't get a fresher side than this watermelon and cucumber salad with chilli, lime and fragrant herbs. You'll want to make it for every barbecue.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Summer,Dairy free,Watermelon,Pescatarian,Low salt,Egg free,Spring,Low sugar,Quick & easy,Halal,Oct 2021,Vegetarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegan,Low fat,Barbeque,Peanut free
name: Watermelon Salad With Chilli & Lime Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
800g seedless watermelon, rind removed, cut into sticks (see Tip)
2 Lebanese cucumbers, halved crossways, cut into sticks

recipeInstructions.text: Place oil and lime juice in a small bowl and whisk to combine.
Arrange watermelon, cucumber, mint and coriander on a large platter. Scatter over chilli and drizzle with dressing. Serve with lime cheeks.
